title: 3 Bedroom 1 Bath Home For Rent
app_fee: $40.00 per person over 18 for background check
posting_body: 3 Bedroom 1 Bath Home for Rent in great school district.
Brand new bathroom with all new fixtures - vanity, toilet, and tub.
Kitchen counters, refrigerator, vinyl flooring, and sink are all brand new.
Fenced in back yard with a huge 2.5 car garage.
Prairie View Middle School and Andrew High School districts.
All utilities - gas, electric, water, and garbage - are the responsibility of the tenant.
Lawn and snow maintenance are also the tenant responsibility.
No smoking allowed in the home.
One small to medium sized dog is allowed.
No other types of pets or multiple dogs are allowed.
Tenant screening will be conducted by <URL> and will include credit and criminal background checks.
There is a $40.00 per person fee up front for each person over 18 years of age at the time of application submission.
This $40.00 will be a credit towards first months rent.
